USE electric_vehicle_ldw
GO

/*Se requiere obtener la informacion sobre los "vehiculos registrados" asi como
información sobre el "propietario" del vehiculo, dicha información debe estar listada por "año" y "mes" en especifico.*/

/*procedimiento almacenado que itera procesando cada una de las particiones de archivo de un directorio en el datalake y 
    guarda el resultado particionado en otro directorio - la consulta select de origen se realiza a una vista de la tabla externa de los datos*/

DROP PROCEDURE IF EXISTS gold.usp_vehicle_registered_by_year_and_month
GO

CREATE OR ALTER PROCEDURE gold.usp_vehicle_registered_by_year_and_month
@year VARCHAR(4),
@month VARCHAR(2)
AS
BEGIN
    DECLARE @create_sql_stmt NVARCHAR(MAX),
            @drop_sql_stmt NVARCHAR(MAX)
    SET @create_sql_stmt = '
        CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE gold.vehicle_registered_by_year_and_month_' + @year + '_' + @month +'
        WITH (
        DATA_SOURCE = electric_vehicle_src, 
        LOCATION = ''gold/vehicle_registered_by_year_and_month/year=' + @year + '/month=' + @month + ''',  
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
    AS
    SELECT c.year, c.month,
            vr.registration_date, 
            v.vin, v.model_year, v.make, v.model, v.electric_range, v.longitude, v.latitude,
            l.county,l.city, l.state, l.postalCode
    FROM silver.vw_vehicle_registration vr
    INNER JOIN silver.vehicle v ON (vr.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id)
    INNER JOIN silver.location l ON (vr.location_id = l.locationId)
    INNER JOIN silver.calendar c ON (CAST(vr.registration_date AS DATE) = c.date) 
    WHERE c.year = '''+ @year +''' AND c.month = '''+ @month +'''';

    PRINT(@create_sql_stmt)
    EXEC sp_executesql @create_sql_stmt;

    SET @drop_sql_stmt = 
        'DROP EXTERNAL TABLE gold.vehicle_registered_by_year_and_month_' + @year + '_' + @month;
    
    PRINT(@drop_sql_stmt)
    EXEC sp_executesql @drop_sql_stmt;
END
GO
